widgets.name: MediaGrid
widgets.description: A grid display of media items that can be organized in customizable columns

widgetData.description: Data specific to the MediaGrid widget

items.description: Array of media items to display in the grid

slug.description: URL path when the media is clicked

label.description: Text label to display below the media item (supports HTML)

actions.description: Actions to perform when the grid item is clicked

noOfColumnsForMobile.description: Number of columns to display on mobile devices

noOfColumnsForDesktop.description: Number of columns to display on desktop devices

aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio for the media items in the grid

scaleFullWidthDesktop.description: Whether to scale the grid to full width on desktop
